titleStmt.title: A vindication of the review, or, The exceptions formerly made against Mr. Horn's catechisme set free from his late allegations, and maintained not to be mistakes by J.H., Parson of Massingham p. Norf.
titleStmt.author: Hacon, Joseph, 1603-1662.

notesStmt.note: "J.H., Parson of Massingham" i.e. Joseph Hacon. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.) under Review of Mr. Horn's catechisme.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
